divs: Sighting DetailsSee them all the time but this was the neatest one. Crused then stopped high up in the sky, started to think it was just a star. Then 20 minutes or so after that it did the swoop down with a tight turn then flung straight up at speeds i couldn't explain! Look up everyone and focus!! You need to train your eyes. Its sorta like those images you look at to see the hidden image after you unfocus your eyes. Same gig!! After getting it you'll start seeing things, usually you'll see 3 or 4 hauling ass together across the sky!! Then after you start seeing them it just opens up more questions you can't answer!! Is Jesus, the gods, or our creators back for 2012, or have they been here the whole time? I ask them or "pray or talk via telepathy" when I see them to come down and have a beer but of course I get no love... o well maybe someday! It sure be fun to bring a bean bag and go for a ride someday ;) I heard their chairs are small from Bob Lazar.. And of course I took video with my smart phone and of course it wouldn't focus! I was sad..
